conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a action movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Certainly! Here are some highly rated action movies that you might enjoy:

1. John Wick (2014)
This movie follows the story of John Wick, a retired hitman who finds himself on a mission to take revenge against those who wronged him.

2. Die Hard (1988)
In this movie, a New York cop, Bruce Willis, finds himself trapped in a skyscraper during a Christmas terrorist attack.

3. Mad Max: Fury Road (2015)
This epic post-apocalyptic action film follows the story of Max Rockatansky, who has become one of the toughest and most skilled warriors in the entire post-apocalyptic wasteland.

4. Gladiator (2000)
In this epic historical drama film directed by Ridley Scott, a young Roman general named Maximus receives orders to lead his army against the Germanic tribes led by Arminius, in what would become known as the Battle of Adrianople in AD 378.

5. The Dark Knight (2008)
In this epic superhero action drama film directed by Christopher Nolan, a crime lord named Joker has caused chaos and destruction across Gotham City, in an attempt to bring order and stability back to the city.

6. Inception (2010)
In this epic science fiction action drama film directed by Christopher Nolan, a group of specialized dream thieves known as "Inceptors" are hired by a wealthy businessman named Saito to perform a highly dangerous task known as "Inception", in which they must enter the dreams of powerful men in order to plant an idea into their subconscious minds.

7. The Avengers (2012)
In this epic superhero action drama film directed by Joss Whedon, a team of superheroes known as "The Avengers" are assembled under the command of their leader and mentor, Iron Man (Tony Stark), in order to prevent a catastrophic event that threatens not only the world but also the very existence of humanity itself.
